nodes.text: A mission was undertaken by Galactic Alliance Security agent Myri Antilles in 44 ABY to the freighter Galactic Princess to investigate whether the ship's captain, the Gran Oobolo, was engaging in criminal activity. Myri's father, Wedge Antilles, was forced to come rescue her when her recording crystals were jammed, cutting her off from GAS personnel, but the crystals were able to collect evidence against Oobolo, and the Princess was tagged by a Galactic Alliance cruiser nearby before it escaped.
